testString: CEF:0|security|threatmanager|1.0|100|Detected a threat. No action needed.|10|src=10.0.0.1 custom=foo\rbar msg=Detected a threat.\nNo action needed.
description: Multi-line fields can be sent by CEF by encoding the newline character as \n or \r. Note that multiple lines are only allowed in the value part of the extensions.
name: Detected a threat. No action needed.

extensions.msg:
Detected a threat.
No action needed.
